thought: To craft a lime bed, I need to first craft spruce planks. I have a stripped jungle wood at slot 25, which I can place into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
